Pre-Game Insights: Shaheen Afridi was named t20 captain a few months ago but was ruled out of the captaincy race due to bad performances.
Babar Azam is back as a captain for the Pakistan team.
Muhammad Amir and Imad Wasim are returning to the national team after a long gap.

New Zealand will miss their star players including Kane Williamson, Devon Conway, Daryl Mitchell, Rachin Ravindra, Mitchell Santner, Lockie Ferguson, Trent Boult, and Glenn Philipps who are busy in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2024.
Michael Bracewell has been appointed as the captain of the New Zealand team for the series.
Tim Robinson and Zak Foulkes will debut in the series for New Zealand.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This series would be an ideal preparation for both Kiwis and Shaheens before the T20 World Cup in the USA in June 2024.
The series will be played in Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium and Gaddafi Stadium Lahore.
The series will be a massive challenge for Michael Bracewell who has been absent from the team with a ruptured Achilles and broken finger for a long time.
